content.text:
# 38th TCA Awards

The 38th TCA Awards were presented on August 6, 2022. The nominees were announced by the Television Critics Association on June 16, 2022.
Winners and nominees
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82;"|Category
! style="background:#EEDD82;"|Winner
! style="background:#EEDD82;"|Nominees
|-
|style="background: #ececec; color: grey; vertical-align: middle; text-align: center;" class="table-na" | Program of the Year
|style="text-align: center;" | Abbott Elementary (ABC)
|
* Better Call Saul (AMC)
* Hacks (HBO Max)
* Severance (Apple TV+)
* Squid Game (Netflix)
* Succession (HBO)
* The White Lotus (HBO)
* Yellowjackets (Showtime)

|

* Ghosts (CBS)
* Hacks (HBO Max)
* Only Murders in the Building (Hulu)
* Reservation Dogs (FX)
* Ted Lasso (Apple TV+)
|-
